template_data.title: The Dark Elf Trilogy Gift Set

document_data.title: The Dark Elf Trilogy Gift Set
document_data.author: [[R.A. Salvatore]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Dark Elf Trilogy Gift Set''''' is a box-set of novels collecting [[Dark Elf Trilogy]]: ''[[Homeland]]'', ''[[Exile]]'', and ''[[Sojourn]]'' by [[R.A. Salvatore]]. It is sometimes called the '''''Dark Elf Trilogy Box Set''''' or the '''''Dark Elf Trilogy Boxed Set'''''.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Dark Elf Trilogy Gift Set, The}}
[[Category:Novel series]]
[[Category:Works by R.A. Salvatore]]
